solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public int threeSumClosest(int[] num, int target) {--newline--        int result = num[0] + num[1] + num[num.length - 1];--newline--        Arrays.sort(num);--newline--        for (int i = 0; i < num.length - 2; i++) {--newline--            int start = i + 1, end = num.length - 1;--newline--            while (start < end) {--newline--                int sum = num[i] + num[start] + num[end];--newline--                if (sum > target) {--newline--                    end--;--newline--                } else {--newline--                    start++;--newline--                }--newline--                if (Math.abs(sum - target) < Math.abs(result - target)) {--newline--                    result = sum;--newline--                }--newline--            }--newline--        }--newline--        return result;--newline--    }--newline--}
